com.samsung.android.sdk.look.airbutton

Class SlookAirButton

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.look.airbutton.SlookAirButton

  • public class SlookAirButton
extends Object
    This class is SlookAirButton.
    This class is needed for AirButton in SDK.

    • Field Detail

      • UI_TYPE_MENU

        public static final int UI_TYPE_MENU
        UI display type menu. It cannot scrollable and has (drawable) or (drawable and text). And display with horizontal direction. Using 32dp*32dp drawable is recommanded if not the drawable is scaled by scaleType = "centerInside"

      • UI_TYPE_LIST

        public static final int UI_TYPE_LIST
        UI display type list. User can scroll and flick. It displays vertical direction.

      • GRAVITY_AUTO

        public static final int GRAVITY_AUTO
        Auto gravity of AirButton. It will set display gravity automatically based on the position of hovered view.

      • GRAVITY_TOP

        public static final int GRAVITY_TOP
        Top gravity of AirButton. It will display TOP of hovered view.

      • GRAVITY_BOTTOM

        public static final int GRAVITY_BOTTOM
        Bottom gravity of AirButton. It will display BOTTOM of hovered view.

      • GRAVITY_LEFT

        public static final int GRAVITY_LEFT
        Left gravity of AirButton. It will display LEFT of hovered view.

      • GRAVITY_RIGHT

        public static final int GRAVITY_RIGHT
        Right gravity of AirButton. It will display RIGHT of hovered view.

      • GRAVITY_HOVER_POINT

        public static final int GRAVITY_HOVER_POINT
        Gravity which base on the location of hover point of AirButton. The base position will based on the hover point.

      • DIRECTION_AUTO

        public static final int DIRECTION_AUTO
        Auto direction of AirButton. It will set display direction automatically based on the position of hovered view.

      • DIRECTION_UPPER

        public static final int DIRECTION_UPPER
        Upper direction of AirButton. It will displays UPPER direction based on first item position.

      • DIRECTION_LOWER

        public static final int DIRECTION_LOWER
        Lower direction of AirButton. It will displays LOWER direction based on first item position.

      • DIRECTION_LEFT

        public static final int DIRECTION_LEFT
        Left direction of AirButton. It will displays LEFT direction based on first item position.

      • DIRECTION_RIGHT

        public static final int DIRECTION_RIGHT
        Right direction of AirButton. It will displays RIGHT direction based on first item position.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SlookAirButton

        public SlookAirButton(View parentView,
              SlookAirButtonAdapter adapter,
              int uiType)
        This is constructor.
        Parameters:
        parentView - parentview is view which can be drawed airbutton.
        adapter - adapter is medium between airbutton and data.
        uiType - this integer means UItype.

    • Method Detail

      • setItemSelectListener

        public void setItemSelectListener(SlookAirButton.ItemSelectListener listener)
        Set ItemSelectListener. Add the Listener which can know item is selected or not.
        Parameters:
        listener - ItemSelectedListener reference. This method is called by selecting item.

      • setGravity

        public void setGravity(int gravity)
        Set gravity. It is widget position based on the hovered view.
        Parameters:
        gravity - It is set for widget position.

      • getGravity

        public int getGravity()
        Get gravity.
        Returns:
        Current gravity.

      • setDirection

        public void setDirection(int direction)
        Set display direction of items. It displays based on the position of first view.
        Parameters:
        direction - Direction what you want to locate items. limitation:with UI_TYPE_MENU: Do not use this function. with UI_TYPE_LIST: you can use only DIRECTION_UPPER/LOWER/AUTO The direction is changed by policy if the gravity is wrong.

      • getDirection

        public int getDirection()
        Get direction of items.
        Returns:
        Current direction.

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(int x,
               int y)
        Set position of AirButton. It is not absolute value. It based on hovered view.
        Parameters:
        x - X position based on hovered view.
        y - Y position based on hovered view.

      • setScrollEnabled

        public void setScrollEnabled(boolean enable)
        Set scrolling. If Button Type is UI_TYPE_MENU, Scroll is not worked. Basically it is "true" for List type AirButton.
        Parameters:
        enabled - true : if you want to enable scrolling. false : if you want to disable scrolling.

      • isScrollEnabled

        public boolean isScrollEnabled()
        Check the scrolling is enable or not.
        Returns:
        This AirButton has scrolling function or not. If scrolling of airbutton widget is enabled, return TRUE, otherwise false.

      • setBounceEffectEnabled

        public void setBounceEffectEnabled(boolean enable)
        Set bounce effect. Basically it is "false" for all widget display types.
        Parameters:
        Enabled - true : if you want to enable bounce effect. false : if you want to disable bounce effect.

      • isBounceEffectEnabled

        public boolean isBounceEffectEnabled()
        Check the BounceEffect is enable or not.
        Returns:
        This AirButton has bounce effect or not. If BounceEffect widget is enabled, return TRUE, otherwise false

      • hide

        public void hide()
        Hide the AirButton.

      • dismiss

        public void dismiss()
        Dismiss the AirButton. It will clear all variables.

      • setAutoControlEnabled

        public void setAutoControlEnabled(boolean enable)
        Set auto control enable or disable of AirButton widget. If you set as false, AirButton and animation icon will not be shown by hover event.
        Parameters:
        enable - is true or false for setting AutoControl.

      • isAutoControlEnabled

        public boolean isAutoControlEnabled()
        Check the auto control enabled.
        Returns:
        AirButton widget is enabled or not. If airbutton widget is enabled, return TRUE, otherwise false.

      • startAnimationIcon

        public void startAnimationIcon(MotionEvent event)
        Starts animation icon with ACTION_HOVER_ENTER when auto control is disabled.
        Parameters:
        event - is Touchevent when user touches the device screen.
        See Also:
        setAutoControlEnabled

      • moveAnimationIcon

        public void moveAnimationIcon(MotionEvent event)
        Move animation icon with ACTION_HOVER_MOVE when auto control is disabled.
        Parameters:
        event - is Touchevent when user touches the device screen.
        See Also:
        setAutoControlEnabled

      • stopAnimationIcon

        public void stopAnimationIcon(MotionEvent event)
        Stop animation icon with ACTION_HOVER_EXIT when auto control is disabled.
        Parameters:
        event - is Touchevent when user touches the device screen.
        See Also:
        setAutoControlEnabled

      • show

        public void show(MotionEvent event)
        Show airbutton with BUTTON_SECONDARY when auto control is disabled.
        Parameters:
        event - is Touchevent when user touches the device screen.
        See Also:
        setAutoControlEnabled
